headline: Should You Buy Constellation Energy While It's Below $400?
summary: Constellation Energy is one of the largest producers of electricity from nuclear power, and investors are excited about its future.

headline: Executives from Pacific Gas & Electric, LG NOVA, Vivint, Samsung Electronics, Constellation Energy, Alarm.com, and more to speak at Parks Associates' 20th annual CONNECTIONS™ Summit at CES® 2026
summary: Parks Associates today announced executives from Pacific Gas & Electric, LG NOVA, Vivint, Samsung Electronics, Constellation Energy, Amazon Web Services, Alarm.com, and more will speak at the 20th annual CONNECTIONS™ Summit at CES® on January 6 at The Venetian Las Vegas, Lando 4304, Level 4, Las Vegas. The milestone executive event brings together tech leaders driving innovation across connectivity, platforms, services, interoperability, and intelligent devices.

headline: Electric Utilities And Pinnacle West In A Popping AI Bubble
summary: Pinnacle West (PNW) is undervalued due to near-term earnings lumpiness, offering a compelling entry point for long-term investors. Read the full analysis here.
